39. The disclosure shall include:
(a) a quantification of the anticipated financial effects in monetary terms before considering
pollution-related actions, or where not possible without undue cost or effort, qualitative
information. For financial effects arising from opportunities, a quantification is not
required if it would result in disclosure that does not meet the qualitative characteristics of
information (see ESRS 1 Appendix B Qualitative characteristics of information);
